            {
                  try
                  {
                        $SettingName = $Manifest->get_setting( 'setting_name' );
                        $DefaultValue = $Manifest->get_setting( 'default_value' , '' );
                              
                        $SettingValue = $this->DBSettings->get_setting( $SettingName , $DefaultValue );
                        
                        $SettingValue = $this->Security->get( $SettingValue , 'script' );
                        
                        return( array( $SettingName , $SettingValue , $Manifest->get_setting( 'label' ) ) );

Exception An exception of this type is thrown.

Definition at line 145 of file settings_view.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $PackageName = $Manifest->get_setting( 'package_name' , false );
                        $PackageVersion = $Manifest->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' );
                        $ConfigFileName = $Manifest->get_setting( 'config_file_name' );
                        $SettingName = $Manifest->get_setting( 'setting_name' );
                        $DefaultValue = $Manifest->get_setting( 'default_value' , '' );
                        
                        $SettingValue = $Manifest->get_package_setting( 
                              $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $ConfigFileName , $SettingName , $DefaultValue 
                        );
                        
                        $SettingValue = $this->Security->get( $SettingValue , 'script' );

                        return( array( $SettingName , $SettingValue , $Manifest->get_setting( 'label' ) ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

process_config_line ( $  ConfigLine  ) 

Function processes config line.

Parameters:
$ConfigLine - Config's line.
Returns:
HTML code.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 372 of file settings_view.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Manifest = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                        $Manifest->load_settings( $ConfigLine );
                        
                        list( $SettingName , $SettingValue , $Label ) = $this->get_setting( $Manifest );
                        
                        switch( $Manifest->get_setting( 'type' , 'input' ) )
                        {
                              case( 'input' ):
                                    return( $this->compile_input_setting( $SettingName , $SettingValue , $Label ) );
                                    
                              case( 'checkbox' ):
                                    return( $this->compile_checkbox_setting( $SettingName , $SettingValue , $Label ) );
                                    
                              case( 'textarea' ):
                                    return( $this->compile_textarea_setting( $SettingName , $SettingValue , $Label ) );
                  
                              default:
                                    $PageComposerUtilities = get_package( 'page::page_composer_utilities' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                                    $PageComposerUtilities->add_error_message( 'illegal_setting_type' );
                                    return( '' );
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

process_db_settings ( $  Str,
$  Changed 
)

Function processes macro 'db_settings'.

Parameters:
$Str - Processing string.
$Changed - Was the processing completed.
Returns:
array( $Str , $Changed ).
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 575 of file settings_view.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $BlockParameters = '';
                        for( ; $BlockParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'db_settings' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $BlockParameters );
                              
                              $SettingName = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'name' );
                              $DefaultValue = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'default' , '' );
                              
                              $Value = $this->DBSettings->get_setting( $SettingName , $DefaultValue );
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( "{db_settings:$BlockParameters}" , $Value , $Str );
                              
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:

Definition at line 519 of file settings_view.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $BlockParameters = '';
                        for( ; $BlockParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'settings' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $BlockParameters );
                              $Str = str_replace( 
                                    "{settings:$BlockParameters}" , 
                                    $this->BlockSettings->get_package_setting( 
                                          $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_name' ) , 
                                          $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' ) , 
                                          $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'config_file_name' ) , 
                                          $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'name' ) , 
                                          $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'default' , '' ) 
                                    ) , 
                                    $Str
                              );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

settings_form ( $  Options  ) 

Function draws tab control with settings.

Parameters:
$Options - Settings.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 422 of file settings_view.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $FormName = $Options->get_setting( 'form_name' );

                        $ConfigPath = dirname( __FILE__ )."/conf/cf_$FormName";
                        if( $this->CachedMultyFS->file_exists( $ConfigPath ) )
                        {
                              $Config = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $ConfigPath , 'exploded' );
                              
                              $this->Output  = '<table id="'.$FormName.'" style="width: 488px; margin: 30px auto;">'.
                                                       '<input type="hidden" name="settings_form_action" value="1">';
                              foreach( $Config as $i => $ConfigLine )
                              {
                                    $this->Output .= $this->process_config_line( $ConfigLine );
                              }
                              $this->Output .= "<tr><td align=\"center\" colspan=\"2\">{href:tpl=std;".
                                                       "page=javascript:ultimix.data_form.SubmitDataForm( '#settings_form' );".
                                                       "text=save}</td></tr></table>";
                        }
                        else
                        {
                              $this->Output = '{lang:tab_manifest_was_not_found}';
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }
